subject: Update user guide to match current UI
body:
- Rename tabs: Templates→Presets, Layout→Structure
- Document new Presets tab sections: Layout, Themes, Looks
- Update Style tab: remove Themes (moved to Presets)
- Add print platforms (A3, A4, A5) to export section
- Add header controls documentation (undo/redo, dark mode, PWA)
- Update Media tab with multi-image library workflow
- Add multi-image layouts section to workflow tips

https://claude.ai/code/session_01SAWXEw6gLFRXxhYet6GSxp
title: Update user guide to match current UI
